content.rendered:
DADABHAI NAOROJI INTERNATIONAL SOCIETY

It May be mentioned that  Dadabhai Naoroji International society has also established “Dadabhai naoroji millennium award” and “Dadabhai naoroji international award”. It is given to those distinguished persons who have made significant achievements and contribution in their respective field of work, Namely Art,Culture,Education,Politics,Social work,Business and industry,Philanthropist,Scientist and any other field related to mankind. A 18 member jury comprising of distinguished persons from England and India  select the deserving candidates after thoroughly scrutinizing the resumes and nominations received, To be ratified by the board of governors of Dadabhai Naoroji international society. It takes three months time to declare the awardees from the date of receiving the nominations. Distinguished and eminent persons like Governors, Academicians,Member of Parliament, Member of Legislative Assemblies, Eminent Lawyers, Philanthropist, Professors and Lecturers, Eminent social workers, Eminent business persons and so on can nominate the awardees. It may be mentioned that the candidate can also apply on their own  by sending their resumes at shayamjyoti@gmail.com

DADABHAI NAOROJI AWARDS

DADABHAI NAOROJI AWARDS

  1. DADABHAI NAOROJI INTERNATIONAL AWARD

  2. DADABHAI NAOROJI MILLENIUM AWARD

DR. S.S Mohapatra quote :-

“Dr. Shyam Sundar Mohapatra former member of parliament(Loksabha and Rajyasabha) and secretary general of Dadabhai Naoroji International Society Giving a clarion call to the Nation to be prepared to face challenges. He said Dadabhai naoroji Millennium award has become a coveted prize for those who have rendered life time service to the nation in any field.”
IIC,NEW DELHI(2002)

HOUSE OF LORD (UK) MEMBER LORD SWARAJ PAUL RECEIVING DADABHAI NAOROJI INTERNATIONAL AWARD

MUMBAI(2003)

CINESTAR AMITABH BACHHAN RECEIVING DADABHAI NAOROJI MILLENIUM AWARD

H.E Bhishma Narayan Singh Governor, Tamilnadu arriving at Dadabhai function. Also seen is Dr. S.S Mohapatra Secratery General and Mr. Tulsidas Jadav(President)

Cine-star and M.P Sunil Dutt addressing a Dadabhai Function at Mumbai. Also seen is Mr. L.M Singhvi (High commissioner to UK)

H.E Balaram Jhakar (Governor Madhya Paradesh) Addressing Dadabhai Naoroji Function at Mumbai, 2005. Also seen are other dignitaries.

His Excellency Balaram Jhakar (governor Madhya Pradesh) along with Dr. L.M Singhvi (HighCommissioner to UK) at Dadabhai Function in Mumbai,2005

Film Producer G.P Sippy receiving Dadabhai Naoroji millennium Award from H.E MM Rajaendran(Governor Odisha) at Mumbai

Field Marshal S.H.F J. Manekshaw receiving Dadabhai Naoroji Millennium award, From Hon. H.D Deve gowda (Prime mister of india) New Delhi

Hon. P.C Alexander (Governor of Maharashtra) addressing the Dadabhai function and Millennium award ceremony at Mumbai

Hon. H.D Devegowda (Prime mister of India) addressing gathering of Dadabhai function and award ceremony at Delhi, Also seen are Tulsidas jadav,Dr. S.S Mohapatra, Y.P Trivedi and other VIPs

Dr. S.S Mohapatra (Secretary general and former M.P) seen with friends at London office of Dadabhai Naoroji.

Dr. S.S Mohapatra (Secretary general and former M.P) seen with Hon. Tulsidas Jadav (President) and Mr. Amarjit Singh Kharaud (Vice president of DBN international society) at London.

AND MANY MORE..............
